titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Finding aid prepared by Brian Carpenter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:16-0400

did.abstract: Word lists and grammatical eliciting; folkloric stories and narratives pertaining to Chehalis history; Quinault medicine-man text; and four Lower Cowlitz words. Recorded at Grand Mound, Washington, in July 1960.
did.physdesc: 5 sound tape reels (9 hr., 58 min.) : analog, 3 3/4 ips, half track, mono ; 7 in.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Presented by M. Dale Kinkade in 1961. This material was recorded with the assistance of a Phillips Fund grant.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Sound tape reel) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Told in entirety in Upper Chehalis, then given in English.
